verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Most High, You who are my stronghold. When troubles come, You’re my hiding place. O Most High, Those who know You trust You. You will not forsake the ones Who seek Your face{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will give thanks to the Lord With all my heart. I will sing glorious praises to Your name. I will be glad and exalt in You, my Lord. Yesterday, today, forever You’re the same.{/lang-eng}
